mapper.insert: insert into user_health (hypertension, hypertension_year, hypertension_drug, diabetes, diabetes_year,diabetes_drug, hyperlipidemia, hyperlipidemia_year, hyperlipidemia_drug, tumor) values (#{hypertension}, #{hypertensionYear}, #{hyperlipidemiaDrug}, #{diabetes},#{diabetesYear}, #{diabetesDrug}, #{hyperlipidemia}, #{hypertensionYear}, #{hyperlipidemiaDrug}, #{tumor})
